content: Pattakkaaran:-  shubaho laabo vabro valrooho kaadeesho.
Janam: - balaheenarum paapikallumaaya nyangalludemel anugrahangallum karunayum, randu lokangallilum ennumennekkum choriyappedumaaraakaname. Aammeen.

items.content: Pattakkaaran:- daivamaaya kartthaave! Paripaakathayulllla nadapadikallaal nyangall thirumumpaake prashobhichukond, ninneyum ninte pithaavineyum ninte vishuddharoohaayeyum, idavidaathe sthuthikkuvaan thakkavannam, ee ninte moonnaamdivasatthe uyirtthezhunnelpinnaalline, svargasenakallodukoode vedippilum vishuddhiyilum pukazhtthuvaan, nyangalle yogyaraakkaname.

content:
1. Ee nin uththhaanatthin naall
Vamshatthalayaam-aadam modikkum
/tnaathhaa! Sarvveshaa! Krpa cheythennil.

2. Ninne mrthanaayavar kabaril
Mudrakkallum kaavalumaayu vachaar
/tnaathhaa…

6. Devaa! Sthuthi nin karunaykkum
Rakshakane! Nin-krpayathinum nithyam.
/tnaathhaa…

En naathhaa! Nin krpa ninne
Ippaapikallil chaayichu.
Nin sleebaachirakil thoongum
Nin sabhamel krpa thonnenam.

Athishakthi mahatthvangallathaal
Mrtharidayeennetton mashihaa!
Durithakkadaleennaadiyaare
Karunayodezhunnelpikkenam.

Ninnuththhaanatthinte vishu-
Ddhothsavamaamee divasatthil
Nin krpaye sthothram chey/u200bvaan
nyangade paapam mochikka.

Krobakall jeevamaratthottam
Kaattheerayar mashihaakkabarum
Pallllikall dayaraakalluminnee
Uththhaanam kondaadunnu.

Sharanatthaale urangeedum
mrthare modippichavane!
Modippichadiyaare nin
Valamaakkanamuththhaanatthaal.

items.content: Pattakkaaran:- naam ellaavarum praarththhichu kartthaavinodu karunayum dayavum yaachikkanam.
Janam:- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Nyangallodu karuna cheythu nyangalle sahaayikkaname.
Pattakkaaran:- sthuthiyum sthothravum, praabhavavum pukazhchayum, maanyupokaattha nalla unnathiyum, ellaaypozhum idavidaathe karettuvaan nyangall yogyaraayittheeraname.

Thiruvishdatthaal maranatthinaayi varukayum, snehaadhikyatthaal kabarilekku praveshikkukayum cheytha nalla udayavanum, manushyarekkurichu snehamullllavanum sakalatthil ninnum uyarnnirikkunna athyunnathanum, svabhaavatthil adrshyanum, naanaadhanangallum vaari edukkappedunna bhandaaramulllla dhanavaanum, ellaa bhaaganga llilekkum svantanikshepangalle vibhajichu kodukkunnavanumaaya mashihaathampuraane! Ninakku sthuthi. Sandhyaa praarththhanayude ee samayatthum, sakala perunnaallukallilum, nerangallilum, naazhikakallilum, nyangallude aayushkaalamokkeyilum sthuthiyum bahumaanavum aaraadhanayum ninakku yogyamaakunnu. Bkulahoon ...

Pattakkaaran:- nyangallude daivamaaya mashihaa! Ninte rakshaakaramaaya nadapadiyaalum manushyarekkurichulllla ninte divya snehatthaalum, kaatholikavum, glaihikavumaaya ninte sabhaye sakala purajaathikallil ninnum theranyedutth, athine ninte vishuddharakthatthaal vilaykku vaangi, mahatthvamulllla manavaattiyaakkittheertthu. Nyangalle ninte makkallum avakaashavumaakkittheerkkukayum, maranatthinteyum saatthaanteyum adimayil ninnu svaathantyappedutthi rakshikkukayum, ninnekkurichulllla arivinte yogyathayulllla prakaashatthaal prashobhippikkukayum cheythirikkunnu. Kartthaave! Nyangallum ninte makkall ellaavarum ninte divyakalppanakall aacharikkukayum, avaye dhyaanikkukayum, raavum pakalum ninte pramaanangallin prakaaram nadann, ninnil santoshikkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Jeevippikkunnathaaya ninte suvishesham nyangall prasamgikkukayum, anyajaathikalludeyum svajaathikalludeyum idayil ninte evangeliyon vahikkukayum, vishuddha shleehanmaarum ariyippukaaraaya deerghadarshimaarum nyangallkku orukkitthannittulllla maargatthodu chernnu athilkoodi nadakkukayum, avarude chovulllla kaaladikall pintudarukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Ninte divya thiruvishdatthaal nyangallellaavarum poornnathappedukayum, nee avarkku kodutthittulllla mahatthvatthil nyangall kireedam dharippikkappedukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Vishvaasikallaaya ninte janangallkku ninte kalppanakallude rahasyam nyangall kaanichukodukkayum, jeevanteyum santoshatthintyum vachanam avarodu prasamgikkukayum, ninte mahimayude prakaashatthaal nyangall prashobhikkukayum, ninte aathmiya uravayil ninnu nyangall dhaaraallamaayi pushdippedukayum, ninte jeevapaaneeyatthaal nyangall poornnamaayi samthrptharaakukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Nyangall nithyavum maadhuryamulllla gaanangallum cherchayulllla sthuthikallum, kabarilninnulllla ninte uyirtthezhunnelppinte mahatthvakaramaaya perunnaallil ninakku karettumaaraakaname. Ellaa neravum idavidaathe aanandakaramaaya sthothrangall ninakkum prathyekam mahatthvamullllathum, athbhutham niranyirikkunnathum, vismayaneeyangallum, mahimayulllla athishayapravartthanangallodukoodiyathumaaya ninte uyirtthezhunnelpinum, anaykkumaaraakaname, ninte karunaykkaayi nokkippaarkkukayum, ninte kurishilttharappine ettuparayukayum, ninte daivathvatthil vishvasikkukayum cheyyunna ninte idavakaykku samaadhaanavum ninte sabhaykku nirappum saujanyamaayi nalkaname. Sathyavishvaasatthodu koode athilninnu yaathra purappettirikkunna vishvaasikallaaya marichupoyavarkku svargatthilninnulllla ninte ezhunnallllatthudivasatthil ninte valathubhaagatthulllla impavum aanandavum kodukkaname. Nyangallum vishvaasamulllla sabhayude makkall ellaavarum ninakkum ninte pithaavinum, vishuddharoohaaykkum, ippozhum eppozhum ennekkum, sthuthiyum sthothravum karettumaaraakaname.
Pattakkaaran:- daivatthilninnu kadangallkku parihaaravum, paapangallkku mochanavum, randu lokangallilum ennekkum naam kaikkollllumaaraakatte.

content:
1. Naathhan mrtharidayilurappi-chaadatthe
“khedikkendaa nin paapatthe-or-tthiniyum nee
nee kuttam cheythathinallo nyaan kondadikall
Edankani nee thinnathinaayu kayppum-kudichen nyaan
/tnagnathayaal-nee ilakall chaartthi
/tnagnathayodenneyavar thookki
Nyaan chintiya rakthatthaal poyu kopam thaathante.

2. Modikka vishuddhasabhe! Nammude naathhan
Moonnaam naallil jeevicha-kkaberee-nnezhunnettaan
Paapatthe kolayaal konnaan-mrthiye mrthiyaal
Krobakall kuntam thaanettakkunta-tthaal neekki
/t than kabaraal-theertthaan kabarnaasham
/tthannuththhaa-naalinguyireki
Ettiva thaan pokki vazhitthettellaam nyangallude.

3. Than shuddhashareeram bhakshi-chuyirekum
raktham paanam cheytha mrtharkkaayu naam-praarththhikka
Azhivillaa lokatthavar than dehikall melum
paapathamassaathmaakkallilum-vaazhaay-vaan thanne.
/tavaraathmaa-kkalle neekkiya naathhaa!
/tettavar cho-nnaar nin s/u200bkeeppaaye
nin valabhaagatthu nirutthee-denam-neeyavare.

items.content: Pattakkaaran:- gogultthaayude mukallil kaazhchayanaykkappedukayum, skeeppaayilekkulllla karettatthaal lokatthinte anyaayam pariharikkukayum cheytha punyappedutthunna baliyum, samyojippundaakunna dhoopakalashavumaaya ente kartthaave! Balaheenaraaya ninte adiyaaraaya nyangall arppichirikkunna nissaaramaaya ee dhoopam manushyarodulllla ninte sneham moolam kaikkollllaname athu ninte bahumaanatthinte mahaashuddhasthhalatthekku praveshikkumaaraakaname. Ninte adukkal ninnu nyangallude kadangallkkum paapangallkkum parihaaravum mochanavum ayachutharukayum, ninte manushyasneham moolam nyangallude marichupoyavare aashvasippikkukayum cheyyaname. Moraan vaalohaan lolmeen. Aammeen

content:
Nin murivukalleennetten moo-ron manamen naathhaa!
Ninnadharangallaho pattin-noolodotthulllloo
/tkaanmaan vanno-nenne bhadar chutti
/tgogultthaayi-kkavare vittodi,
Nin maarvvu thurannum, raktham-vaarnnum kanden nyaan.
Kurishaaladiyaare kaakkum-naathhannaayu sthothram
/thaaleluyyaa-attahasikkunnen.

Enne mayakki nin nal sau-ndaryaa-shcharyangall.
Ninsthuthi daivasuthaa paadaan-svaramivanillonnum
/tpithrvalamaayu ni-nne kandan melil
/tkallllanmaar than idayilumaazhatthil
Nin shayya marichor maddhye-svargam nin peedham
eerayar melum narar keezhum-naathhannaayu sthothram
/thaaleluyyaa-attahasikkunnu.

Nyangall than mrthare neeyo-rtthekeedaashvaasam.
chaartthi snaane madbahaayil ninne ull-kkondor
/tnin shuddhasharee-ratthe bhakshich
/tnin rakthakkaa-saa paanam cheythor
Abaraahatthodu nin raajya-tthaanandichaartthum,
Nin valamaayu ninnum, ninne sthothram cheyyenam.
/thaaleluyyaa-nalkeedaashvaasam.

Haale... Haale... Svargam santoshikkum bhoovaanandikkum
Mashihaaraajan thannuththhaanatthil. Haaleluyyaa.

Makkallilappan krpa chey/u200bvathu pole haa… haa…
Bhakthanmaaril Daivam krpa cheyyum.
/tpullinu thulyam naranude naallkallaho haa… haa…
/tpookkunnithu vayalil poochedi pole.

Sharanatthaale nin krpayil
Maranamadanyoru daasare nin
Jeevasvaramathunartthaname
Kabareennudyaanatthinnaay.

Rakshakane! Nin gaathratthe-bhakshichum nin
Vilayerum rakthakkaasaa-paanam cheythum
Mrtharaayore naasham nee-kki jeevippi-
Chaniyenam ninne nokku-nnavaril kaanti.

Mrthare jeevippippaanezhu-nnallllum raajaa
Mukilazhakin melaaghoshitha-naayeedunnu.
Nayavaanmaar than munkompin-naadam ketti-
Ttengkiyaninyethirelpaanaayu poyeedunnu.

1. Uththhaanatthaal thansabhaye veendonaam puthraa!
Nin shaino nalki than prajaye kaakkenam nee.

2 aanandamezhunneedumathinte konukallil nin
shaino kottaykkoppam mevi kaattheedenam.

3. Nin shlommo than vaathilu kaakkenam nin shaino
vannangadi vepporellaarum kandeedenam.

4. Sthuthyan sabhaye theertthathine kaattheedum thaathan
Vandyan kolayaal-sadyayathinne-keedum puthran

5. Kabaree-nnuyir poondoru suthanaayu ellaa- jaathi-
Kkaaril-ninnum-vandana-koottum-roohaa sthu-thyan.

6. Vinman lokarkkaikyam nalkeedum shai-no nin
Uththhaanatthaal nin sabhayil shaino nalkenam.

Shuddhan nee aaloho!
Shuddhan nee balavaane!
Krooshettone! Mrthiheenaa! Parishuddhan nee krpa cheytheedaname. +

Naathhaa! Krpa cheytheedaname
Naathhaa! Kanivaal krpa cheyka
Naathhaa! Karmmavumarththhanakallumettittavayaal krpa cheytheedaname.

Sthothram the deveshaa!
Sthothram the srashdaave!
Sthothram paapikalladiyaaril-krpa cheytheedum mashihaa raajaave!
